posts.text: Post 151: Today I felt motivated. I did some productive work and went for a walk.
adaptive_evidence: I felt motivated today and took positive actions.

posts.text: Post 152: Today I felt sad. I had a hard time getting out of bed and felt overwhelmed.
maladaptive_evidence: I felt sad and struggled with daily tasks.
